body_html:
@ashokvishnoi1994 You will have to export your trained model with Tensorflow Serving Server for inference. Here is the documentation on Inference/serving.
https://tensorflow.github.io/serving/serving_basic
and
https://tensorflow.github.io/serving/serving_advanced

body:
@ashokvishnoi1994 You will have to export your trained model with Tensorflow Serving Server for inference. Here is the documentation on Inference/serving. 
https://tensorflow.github.io/serving/serving_basic
and 
https://tensorflow.github.io/serving/serving_advanced
